special_text:
Transcend [i](Activate as a sorcery to gain the next type and a +1/+1 counter.)[/i]
You may play cards exiled with Fahrib and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to play them.
{U}{B}: Demon
Each player exiles a card from their hand.
{4}{U}{B}: Elder
Exile the top five cards of each player's library. Fahrib gains “Spells you cast from anywhere other than your hand cost {2} less to cast.”
